type1_missing.reasoning: Statistics Bar with three metrics (Total tasks count, Completed tasks count, Completion percentage) completely missing from dashboard page

type2_incorrect.reasoning: Session expiry set to current time instead of 7 days in the future
Session cookie created without maxAge property for 7-day expiry
Error responses use { error: 'string' } format instead of specified { error: { code: 'CODE', message: 'message' } } format
Task title validation enforces 50 character maximum instead of specified 100 characters
Tasks sorted by createdAt ASC (oldest first) instead of specified DESC (newest first)
Password minimum 6 characters validation missing on client side in registration form
Login page lacks explicit client-side email format validation beyond HTML5 type attribute
Dashboard displays hardcoded mock user name 'User' instead of actual authenticated user's name

type3_extraneous.reasoning: Admin dashboard page with user statistics table not specified in requirements
Task priority dropdown (low/medium/high) not mentioned in specification
Task priority display indicator not mentioned in specification
API accepts and handles priority parameter not specified in requirements
